I know this game is a classic, but god did I have a frustrating time playing it, wouldn't have finished it if I hadn't been the one buying it

Half life is a masterpeice,I love it for it's corny NPCS, for its focus on interactivity and story and Guns that are just magnificent, (Tau cannon should've been in 2) Balanced Gameplay. Varying difficulty settings, a training room, Deathmatch, Fun to fight AI that'll make you really think. It's nowhere near half life 2's balance but its fun to learn, it's very much enjoyable, Then theres Xen. Xen is like you got a fancy new suit, and spaghetti sauce just fell on it. Xen is okay, it's not as good as the rest. But it ruins the pacing. Highly recommend this game. After you play the full series, you'll understand why we so desperately want a finale. The finale leaves you thirsting for more gun play, especially with your newest toy you got (The Gluon gun) So you can head out for deathmatch where all your shooting skills get put to the test against other players in servers with varying player counts. I wish good will to those who helped make this game. In conclusion, Half life is a really good experience, Half life 2 is on a whole nother level. The fast paced marine AI, THE SETPIECES, THE PERFECTLY TIMED MUSIC,GORDON FREEMAN, THE HEADCRABS, THE INTRIGUING PREMISE, THE G-MAN, THE CROWBAR. It's all iconic.

Ótimo jogo, tem uma ambientação boa e história também.Mistura um pouco de terror com ação

I got this game due to the great reputation it has. I didn't really know what it was really about but I'm having fun so far. It has a bit of a puzzle aspect requiring you to go back and forth between different places in order to progress through the game. I was also caught off guard with a few jump scares, but so far it is a good game.

les cuento mi historia con este juego y lo que pienso ahora de haberlo jugado ahora despues de mucho tiempo (y obiamente dejo mi reseña), pues.. half life es un juego que siempre quize completar p-pero.. no pude por que cuando era pequeña me daba mucho miedo.. tenia mucho miedo de los bichos y de un bicho en concreto y era el bicho del techo, ese que te agarraba con la lengua y pues fue tanto asi que tuve pesadillas con ese bicho...7 veces y fue horrible para mi, y hasta ahora ya no tuve mas pesadillas con este bicho, pasaron 13 años desde que lo juege y ahora lo volvi a jugar y el juego ahora me parece...¡¡Uno de los mejores que he jugado y uno de los mejores clasicos que existen de los videojuegos!!,el bicho este de la lengua ya no me da tanto miedo como antes pero aun no me puedo sacar un poco de miedo que le tengo ahora, pues sip este juego me parece uno de los mejores que hay en el mercado de steam y de como innovo en su epoca de los juegos shooters, Recomendado totalmente este juego ¡vale totalmente la pena cada centavo! amo este juego ahora y pienso jugar al 2 luego de terminarmelo, en fin este juego es increiblemente bueno y unos de mis juegos favoritos desde ahora n.n

линейный шутер

Ох уж  эта извечная классика!  Игра ставшая первым  проектом Valve  набрала настолько огромную популярность что получила несколько  дополнений и частей серии.  Эта игра стала феномином в поп-культуре и удостоина одного из популярнийших и узнаваемых врагов: хедкрабов. Игра не безумный кровавый шутер а целая линия головоломок со стрельбой конечно-же. Бессмертная классика живущая сейчас и надеюсь  будет эталоном для многих шутеров и потом.  11/10.

Fantastic game! This is the first time I play Half-Life, my second Valve game, and WOW I had missed on something great! The very final levels (from chapter 15 onwards) are not as excellent as the other levels, but still the game is fantastic. It's also great that Valve keeps this running this smooth in current computers. That's something many other developers could learn to do. Overall this was a great experience!
Score: 9/10

This was better than I thought it would be. I thought it was going to be over hyped. I didn't judge it for graphics or anything like that for not being modern. It was a good game on it's own. The story and game play were engaging enough and they mixed it up so it wasn't stale. It's been years since I played it last and the idea of booting it up again and taking it for a spin isn't offensive.
story is great if you want to get into the half life story play this and the expansion packs

Unlike my colleagues, I have a tendency to stay alive. Since this morning, I've been bitten, shot, bombed, electrocuted, almost drowned, almost fallen to my death, and strangled. Rasputin wasn't so lucky! But, here I am, exposing myself to radiation. Why not? Let's add to the list: maybe I can get burned, stabbed, and poisoned before the day is done.

A pesar de que nunca lo jugué en mi niñez, aproveche unas rebajas y la verdad ya se porque razón el juego fue tan conocido en su época. Existieron momentos muy frustantes en donde me fue casi imposible seguir como por una semana. Lo recomiendo a todos los que le gustan los retos. Lo pase en 50 horas probandolo por primera vez.

This is an extremely good game and an all time classic. However be warned, due to it being an old-school shooter, the difficulty is high even on normal difficulty. While I recommend it, if you aren't used to old school shooters or want to experience half life but a more modern take, get Black Mesa. If you want the original experience, play this. You won't regret it.
